mapper.select: select a.no,a.stock_code,b.stock_name,b.stock_type,c.stock_close,b.value, c.valuediffrate from likecompany a, hn_stock_code b ,(select * from (select * from hn_stock_close order by close_date desc)where rownum <=40)c where no=#{no} and a.stock_code=c.stock_code and a.stock_code=b.stock_code
delete from follow where me=#{me} and likeman=#{likeman}

select nickname, count(nickname) count from (select p.me,p.no,p.percent,p.stock_type,p.regdate,w.nickname from portfolio p, hn_waggle w where p.no=w.no and me=#{me} and to_char(regdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{regdate}) group by nickname
